title: 820 3023-A Not booting not mounting
message:
Hello, I received a job with a very damaged board 820 3023-A and I decided to replace it as they were too many issues.
After I have replaced the board I am unable to boot from the same hard drive that was in.
The hard drive is working all right but it seems that I can manage to mount it or to do anything.

This has the FileVault on but the customer knows only the login password.
If I would at least manage to get to the login screen it would be amazing

Any help would be greatly appreciated

title: 820 3023-A Not booting not mounting
message:
The new board doesn't have APFS support.
Get an empty SSD and do a fresh install of High Sierra on it; NOT the client SSD!
Once finished, put back client SSD.

title: 820 3023-A Not booting not mounting
message: Thank you so much, I was thinking about this, but I wasn't sure.
